title: Custom webpack extract-i18n schema for Build Facade

i18nFormat.description: Output format for the generated file.

i18nLocale.description: Specifies the source language of the application.

outputPath.description: Path where output will be placed.

outFile.description: Name of the file to output.

path.description: Path to the custom webpack configuration file

mergeStrategies.description: Merge strategies per webpack config field

replaceDuplicatePlugins.description: Flag that indicates whether to replace duplicate webpack plugins or not
